name: Neptide
description:
Neptide is an early-access Vampire Survivors - like where you play the role of a contracted explorer to chart the surface and delve in to the depths of the planet Neptune. 

The currently available stage(s) are:

  • Breaching Reef

Future stages are:

  • Encroaching Kelp
  • Entombing Gorge
  • Abyssal Trench

To clear a stage, complete the objective listed on the terminals on the stage select screen. These objectives differ from stage to stage. 

If you'd like to support the project via donation, assets, or join the development team, contact me at daniel08clark@gmail.com
